name: coral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 a substance like rock, formed in the sea by groups of particular types of small animal, often used in jewellery: a coral bracelet/necklace
Singapore Photographer Imran Ahmad/Moment/GettyImages
a colour between orange and pink

a hard substance formed in the sea from masses of shells of very small sea animals, usually orange or red in color
